name: BLASTER
description: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called BLASTER. BLASTER features BLASTER 2 and BLASTER 3 you can play. Wanna arcade? Collect coins and use your blaster weapons and blaster character to blast enemies and level up in BLASTER. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons to blast enemies and level up in BLASTER 2. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons to kill enemies and level up and play multiplayer in BLASTER 3. Score a million points to win the BLASTER GAMES. Get a high score on the BLASTBOARD playing the BLASTER games. You can play BLASTER and BLASTER 2 in single player mode. And you can play BLASTER 3 in single player and multiplayer mode. Blast or be Blasted. Let's play BLASTER
